statements: SELECT * FROM hiking_trails
SELECT trail_name, trail_length_km FROM hiking_trails WHERE difficulty_level = 'Moderate'
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level FROM hiking_trails ORDER BY trail_length_km DESC
SELECT * FROM hiking_trails WHERE trail_length_km > 5
SELECT trail_id, trail_name, difficulty_level FROM hiking_trails LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM hiking_trails WHERE difficulty_level = 'Moderate' ORDER BY trail_length_km DESC;
SELECT trail_id, trail_name FROM hiking_trails WHERE trail_length_km > 5 AND difficulty_level = 'Difficult';
SELECT trail_id, trail_name, difficulty_level, trail_length_km FROM hiking_trails WHERE difficulty_level IN ('Easy', 'Moderate') AND trail_length_km BETWEEN 3 AND 10 ORDER BY trail_length_km ASC;
SELECT trail_id, trail_name, trail_length_km FROM hiking_trails ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC, trail_length_km DESC;
SELECT * FROM hiking_trails WHERE trail_length_km < 4 OR difficulty_level = 'Easy' ORDER BY trail_length_km ASC, difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM trails;
SELECT name, difficulty, length FROM trails ORDER BY difficulty;
SELECT id, name, difficulty, length FROM trails WHERE difficulty = 'Moderate';
SELECT name, length FROM trails WHERE length > 5;
SELECT id, name, rating FROM trails JOIN trail_reviews ON trails.id = trail_reviews.trail_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM trails WHERE difficulty='Beginner' ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT name, difficulty, length FROM trails WHERE length > 5;
SELECT t.name, tr.review_text, tr.rating FROM trails t JOIN trail_reviews tr ON t.id = tr.trail_id;
SELECT * FROM trail_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM trail_reviews;
SELECT * FROM hiking_trails
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level FROM hiking_trails ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC
SELECT trail_name, trail_length FROM hiking_trails WHERE difficulty_level='Moderate'
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level, trail_length FROM hiking_trails WHERE trail_length > 5.5 ORDER BY trail_length ASC
SELECT trail_name FROM hiking_trails WHERE difficulty_level='Hard'
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level, trail_length FROM hiking_trails ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC
SELECT trail_name, trail_length FROM hiking_trails WHERE difficulty_level='Moderate'
SELECT trail_name, trail_length FROM hiking_trails WHERE difficulty_level='Difficult' ORDER BY trail_length DESC
SELECT * FROM trail_difficulty WHERE difficulty_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT trail_name, trail_length FROM hiking_trails WHERE trail_length > 5 ORDER BY trail_length ASC
SELECT * FROM trails LIMIT 5
SELECT trail_name, trail_length FROM trails WHERE difficulty_level = 3
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level FROM trails ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC
SELECT * FROM trail_reviews WHERE trail_id = 1
SELECT trail_name, trail_length, difficulty_level FROM trails WHERE trail_length > 5
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level, trail_length FROM trails WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY trail_length DESC
SELECT trail_name, trail_length, reviewer_name, review_text FROM trails INNER JOIN trail_reviews ON trails.trail_id = trail_reviews.trail_id WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT trail_name, rating FROM trails INNER JOIN trail_ratings ON trails.trail_id = trail_ratings.trail_id WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT trail_name, trail_length FROM trails WHERE trail_length < 5
SELECT trail_name, image_url FROM trails INNER JOIN trail_images ON trails.trail_id = trail_images.trail_id WHERE trail_images.image_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM trails;
SELECT trail_name, trail_length FROM trails WHERE difficulty_level = 'Moderate';
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level, trail_length FROM trails ORDER BY trail_length DESC;
SELECT trail_name, trail_length, difficulty_level FROM trails WHERE trail_length > 5 ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC;

SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level, COUNT(trail_activity_mapping.activity_id) AS num_activities FROM trails JOIN trail_activity_mapping ON trails.trail_id = trail_activity_mapping.trail_id GROUP BY trails.trail_id;
SELECT * FROM trails;
SELECT trail_name, difficulty_level, trail_length FROM trails ORDER BY trail_length DESC;
SELECT t.trail_name, tr.review_text, tr.rating FROM trails t INNER JOIN trail_reviews tr ON t.trail_id = tr.trail_id WHERE tr.rating > 3;
SELECT t.trail_name, ta.activity_name FROM trails t JOIN trail_activity_mapping tam ON t.trail_id = tam.trail_id JOIN trail_activities ta ON tam.activity_id = ta.activity_id;
SELECT t.trail_name, tp.photo_url FROM trails t LEFT JOIN trail_photos tp ON t.trail_id = tp.trail_id WHERE tp.photo_id IS NOT NULL;
